line:
රොඩු වැටි පල්‌ ගඳක්‌ විහිදෙන
ළිං වගේම අපේ ජීවිත

Metaphor meaning in English: The quality of life is very bad

line:
ඉහපු ළිඳකට උනන උල්පත
මම හෙළන දාඩිය ය කඳුළ ය
Metaphor_in_English:
The spring that boils into a well is
my sweat and tears
Metaphor meaning in English: from my hard work that springs the water into the well

line: සෙල්මුවා පිළිමයක්‌ විලස මම නිසල වෙමි
Metaphor_in_English: I am as still as a statue
Metaphor meaning in English: I am not allowing my feelings to override me and make me restless. I will maintain my serene mentality

line: නුගක්‌ සේ අතු අහසෙ විහිදුවා
Metaphor_in_English: The branches spread like a banyan in the sky
Metaphor meaning in English: I am strong and undestructible even in difficult times.

line: මල්‌ වගේ හිත්‌ ගල්‌ වගේ වෙන
Metaphor_in_English: Hearts are like flowers
Metaphor meaning in English: person has a generous, kind and tender heart

line: සතුටු මල්‌ ඇට නිදා සිටිති ය
Metaphor_in_English: The happy flower seeds are asleep
Metaphor meaning in English: Something more exciting and beautiful is going to happen in the near future

line: ආදරේ මහ වැස්ස වැටුණම
Metaphor_in_English: When love rains heavily
Metaphor meaning in English: When the feeling of love comes to ones mind he will flurish with new life.

line: අහසක නැගී ආ සඳයි ප්‍රමය
Metaphor_in_English: The rising sun in the sky is love
Metaphor meaning in English: The rising sun in the sky symbolizes the warmth, hope, and endless possibilities that love brings into our lives

line: හිතෙන හැටියට මගේ හදවත රැක පායන අහස වාගෙය
Metaphor_in_English: My heart seems to be like the sky that appears at night that gets brighten by the stars
Metaphor meaning in English: you brought happiness and peace to my life and enlighten my life.

line: තැනින් තැන හැලී ගිය ලේ, මුහුදකට සමයි
Metaphor_in_English: The blood spilled everywhere, like a sea
Metaphor meaning in English: So many people have been killed and their blood has  spread all over the floor.

line: අමුතු සතෙකු සේ ගුලී ගැසී ඔබට ආලය කරමි
Metaphor_in_English: now I am Huddled like a strange animal and loving you.

line: පෙන්නුවට වගේ කියල  නොනැවෙන යකඩයක්‌
Metaphor_in_English: women are like unbendable iron,
Metaphor meaning in English: women are very strong and determined such that no person can change them or hurt them as they want,

line: ගැහැනියක්‌ කියන්නේ තනිකරම රෝසමල්‌ කඩයක්‌!
Metaphor_in_English: women are exclusively like a shop of roses
Metaphor meaning in English: women are also very beautiful tender and pleasent.

line: ආදරේ උණු කොපි එකක්සී තල දාට උනුහුම් ගෙන​
Metaphor_in_English: love is like a hot cup of coffee,
Metaphor meaning in English: love brings us a sense of warmth and self satisfaction,

line: ආදරේ රත්නපුර වගේ අව්‌ වැස්ස නිශ්චිත නැති
Metaphor_in_English: love is like Ratnapura where the weather is uncertain.
Metaphor meaning in English: love is  something that is uncertain and connot keep trust on.

line: තනිකම කියන්නේ කැෆෙන් ගැල්වූ දෙයකට
Metaphor_in_English: loneliness is like something that has  caffaine in it
Metaphor meaning in English: loneliness is something that  we get addicted into once we gat addicted to it  it is very difficult to abstain from it.

line: වෙහෙර මහ දේවියක්‌ විලසින්‌ විටෙක සවිබල රැගෙන ආවේ
Metaphor_in_English: she brought strength to my life like Vehera Maha Devi,
Metaphor meaning in English: The strength of my life is my mother who is always by my side protecting and guiding me

line: ඉරෙන්‌ නැගෙනා රශ්මි ධාරා ලෙසින්‌ විත්‌ මට එළිය වූයේ
Metaphor_in_English: my life was enlighten like the streams of light comming from the sun
Metaphor meaning in English: my mother brought happiness joy and wisdom to my life

line: සඳ අනුලාවක චිලසින්‌
සිතිවිලි ඇඳේ සිතුවම්‌ වැනි වළා යට

Metaphor meaning in English: you are beautiful when smiling

Metaphor_in_English: Searched like a madman
Metaphor meaning in English: I kept on finding you everywhere on earth.

Metaphor_in_English: it moves slowly as a cow that has been condemed to death
Metaphor meaning in English: It rained ardently.

line: ජෝතිය ලැගුම්‌ ගන්‌ ළා තණපිටිය  උඩ
Metaphor_in_English: water bubbles are spread all over the ground such as cloth covering the ground grasses,
Metaphor meaning in English: rain water hits the ground so hard,

Metaphor_in_English: rain hits to the ground such as the noise of the  hoof clashing the ground,
Metaphor meaning in English: rain water poured heavily from the roof of the house,

Metaphor_in_English: roof of the house seems be like swallowing all the water that falls onto it and pouring them from the ends of the roofs,
Metaphor meaning in English: huge amount of rain water drained along the trenches.

Metaphor_in_English: roof of the house seems be like swallowing all the water that falls onto it and pouring them from the ends of the roofs,

Metaphor meaning in English: water drained drained like sig zag manner

Metaphor_in_English: my love is like a happy moon
Metaphor meaning in English: suggests that the speaker's love is serene, calming, and content, just like a happy moon might imply a sense of peace and satisfaction.

Metaphor meaning in English: my nation is precious,

Metaphor meaning in English: mind is pure and beautiful, my friend brings wisdom to life

Metaphor_in_English: ladies are like Goddess,

Metaphor meaning in English: Weligama Patuna is very picturesque and it makes people blissful

Metaphor_in_English: like a child that loves the moon
Metaphor meaning in English: my love for you is  unconditional and forever

line: කොටියෙක්‌ කියා සිතුවට නුඹ මනෝමයෙන...
Metaphor_in_English: Even though you think you're like a tiger,
Metaphor meaning in English: You are strong, Rebellious And glorious.

line: තවමත්‌ උඹ පූසෙක්‍ ය​ දැනගන්‌ ඒක ඉතින...
Metaphor_in_English: You are like a cat.
Metaphor meaning in English: You are powerless

line: ලී කොටන්‌ වලට නේක නම්දෙන වඩුවකු සේ.....
Metaphor_in_English: Like a carpenter that names the wood in different names,
Metaphor meaning in English: You are a person that brought meaning to my life,

line: මහා කළුගල්‌ වලට ගැඩ දැමූ කැටයම්‌ කරුවකු සේ...
Metaphor_in_English: Like an Engraver that engraved large black stones
Metaphor meaning in English: you brought satisfaction and pleasure to my Life

line: සැරදෙ හසරද සඳ පුන්‌ස ඳ පහන්‌ පිරිසිදු
Metaphor_in_English: mind is pure as the full moon,
Metaphor meaning in English: the way he thinks is very pleasent ,

line: පියක රු පියන්‌ පිර පියවුරු ලෙසින්‌ හොබනා
Metaphor_in_English: ladies' bossoms are like swans
Metaphor meaning in English: female breats are very attactive

line: සතර දිගත යස හර ලම්බා පුරු දු
Metaphor_in_English: fame is like a pearl
Metaphor meaning in English: fame is precious and can be priced

line: පුන් සඳ වන්‌ වත සිට පෙන්වා ලොව ට​
Metaphor_in_English: face is like a full moon,
Metaphor meaning in English: his face is charming,

line: රන්‌ කඳ මෙන්‌ බබලන මෙ නිථඳුන්‌ දු ට​
Metaphor_in_English: the king is  glistening as a trunk of gold
Metaphor meaning in English: he is smart and handsome

line: මොළවා උනඹුවන ළෙයි සෝක ගිනි රු ස​
Metaphor_in_English: feeling of being sad is like fire
Metaphor meaning in English: being sad is very annoying

line: දිනිඳුන්‌ කිරණ මෙන්‌ මැති මුව සියපත ට
Metaphor_in_English: like the sun light that falls onto the blossoms
Metaphor meaning in English: he gave me wisdom
